Blacknightmare::

Blacknighmare stopped and she looked to Orchestra and said with a 
nice tone, it was a special nice nice tone "That had been a scary 
experience, hadn't been??"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> (Everybody, just so nobody gets confused in the future, if I ever 
do a post
> with Blowpipe, I will do it in Triggerhappy's section.  I write my 
chars in
> sections.)
> 
> ::Orchestra/Triggerhappy/Skullgrin/Composer::
> 
>        Orchestra took his arm back quickly, and started to get his 
mind back
> in focus to answer Blacknightmare's question.
> 
>         "Well, we fought many enemies.  But the one experience I 
will never
> forget is the time when we were up against the Voc.  I don't know 
if you've
> ever heard of them, they are an alien race with strange powers," 
Orchestra
> cleared his throat,"We were fighting them out in space, always 
attacking
> eachother's colonies.  One day, I was assigned to sneak into a Voc 
base and
> steal certain propaganda and find the secret of their powers and 
technology.
> I was in there, and then, they caught me.  I was prisoned, about to 
be
> executed, when Composer and his team busted in.  We then got 
powerful enough
> to demolish their forces!"
> 
>           "Those days seem so old now," He said.
